ygData.subject: Re: Maximals ATTN all players outside the Maximal base
ygData.msgSnippet: Shadowcaster smiled. It was clear that the time was right for him to reveal his past to the Maximals on this planet. After all, the time for his secrecy ended

Shadowcaster smiled. It was clear that the time was
right for him to reveal his past to the Maximals on
this planet. After all, the time for his secrecy ended
with the Great War.

"Of course I remember him. Everyone, maybe It's about
time I give you an idea of some of the history of
Cybertron that has never been told. The reason you
haven't heard it before is because that was how I
wished it to be, and the result of Alpha Trion
respecting my wishes. To give you an idea of my age, I
was the last of the original Decepticons to be created
by the Quintessons...."

For the next ten minutes he went on to tell them about
how the Quintessons had originally constructed him to
be the ultimate piece of assassination/espoinage
hardware and how there was a glitch in his programming
that made him wish to fight with honour, which he'd
just learned was by the hand of Primus himself. How
just as the quintessons had been about to deactivate
and mindwipe him, Alpha trion had saved him when the
compund he was in during the Great uprising.

He then went on to tell them of the years before the
rise of Megatron, when Alpha Trion had used his keen
mind to train him as an excellent scientist and
doctor, and how he and Alpha Trion had come up with
the refit process to upgrade the Autobots into a force
that could handle the Decepticons. How he decided to
fight the very members of his race because he believed
they had betrayed their initial purpose of being
protectors of the Autobots, using his body for what it
was meant for and fighting a one bot intel and
sabotage war against the Decepticons on Cybertron,
making Alpha Trion swear to keep his existence a
secret. How when Cybertron totally fell to the
Autobots, he appeared out of the shadows and joined
them as a double agent for the Autobots.

He then told them of his post great war years on one
of the exploration missions where he met his mate who
helped him to heal from the past, how they'd spawned 3
children, among them Rattrap. How Megatron 2 had
attacked their base and slaughtered everyone but
Ratrap while he was out on a scouting mission. How
he'd sworn vengence on Megatron after stowing Rattrap
into a CR Chamber and activating a distress signal,
then becoming obsessed with destroying him to the
point of stowing away on the Axalon. 

How when he'd arrived, after an unsuccessful attempt
to destroy him during his first  battle against the
Predacons, he'd retrieved the Matrix in an attempt to
use its power to destroy Megatron, only to be saved by
former leaders, mainly his old friend Alpha Trion, and
then been Optimised into Shadimus Prime. How after a
rocky reunion between him and Rattrap, he'd managed to
mend thier bridges, and finally how he'd given his
life in a valiant attempt to destroy the weapon
systems of the Nemesis during Megatron's final crazed
attack on the Ark.

And finally how Primus had ressurected his spark and
Body, revealing that he was originally chosen by
Primus to be a guardian for his children, and how he'd
been sent back to protect his children from Unicron.

 
 --- Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote: 
---------------------------------
Blackfang was taken by surprise for a moment. That
sure hadn't been 
in the history data he'd read!

Blackfang: Well, this isn't Cybertron, so refined
materials will be 
hard to come by. The ones we do have are mostly
second-hand or 
damaged, and from what I saw outside, the base could
use a good new 
plating.

He thought for a moment.

Blackfang: Say, since you're that old, you must
remember someone 
named Skylinx?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Polar Claw
<cycodrone@y...> wrote:
> Shadowcaster decloaked to address Blackwing. "I
> suspect Primus might help. Considering that he
> ressurected my body and brought my spark back here
> from our present time using transwarp portals, I
more
> than likely suspect that he can help out again."
> 
> His expression now turned cheeky "Besides, if Alpha
> Trion and I could reconstruct Orion Pax into Optimus
> Prime, not to mention rebuild all his troops and
> design the Ark, how hard could building a small ship
> with transwarp power be?"
> 
> After realising the shock what he just said might
> deliver to some characters, especially Kup who he'd
> worked on, he decided to give the group of Maximals
a
> few cycles for what he'd just said to sink in.  
> 
>  --- Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote: 
> ---------------------------------
> Blackfang had heard the conversation and joined.
> 
> Blackfang: Well, even if we did leave it to you -
> which, by the way, 
> I'm all disposed to do - how would even even leave
> this rock? The 
> only ship in flying conditions is the Tripred's own.

> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Polar Claw
> <cycodrone@y...> wrote:
> > Shadowcaster smiled and winked before reminding
the
> > young Maximal of his old 'party trick' by
cloaking.
> > "Just leave that to me..." he said quietly but
> > confidently.
> > 
> >  --- OMWOS <o_mighty_wife_of_shinigami@y...>
> > wrote: 
> > ---------------------------------
> > Slowly a wide grin spead across the feline
Maximals
> > face and he sat up. 
> > He arched his back, the sounds of whirling gears
and
> > wire hummed around 
> > him as his frame contorted, coling in and out as
he
> > switched from beast 
> > mode to robot mode, standing shorter then
> > Shadowcaster. User, it was 
> > great to see an old face back from the Matrix,
even
> if
> > he did go insane 
> > for awhile.
> > 
> > He grinned but the smile faded from the feral bot.
> He
> > gave a slow nod 
> > of his head. "Yeah, but how are we going to do
that?
> > We can't just 
> > waltz in and say hey remember us?"
> > 
> > OMWOS
> > 
> >
